inclusion.criterion: surgically accessible primary or metastatic site
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Estimated survival of 6 months or greater
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Must have an ECOG performance status of 0 or 1
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Must have adequate organ and marrow function. Specifically:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin <= 2.0 x the upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alkaline phosphatase, AST, and/or ALT <2.5 x the ULN for patients without evidence of liver metastases; <5 X ULN for patients with documented liver metastases
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Radiotherapy within 28 days prior to the day of tumor resection (Day 1).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: No myelosuppressive chemotherapy within 28 days prior to the day of tumor resection
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone radiotherapy, which is a contraindication for this trial.
